verses.verse: Yahweh<WH3068> showed<WH7200> me,<WH8147> and behold, two baskets<WH1736> of figs<WH8384> set<WH3259> before<WH6440> the temple<WH1964> of Yahweh,<WH3068> after<WH310> that Nebuchadnezzar<WH5019> king<WH4428> of Babylon<WH894> had carried away captive<WH1540> Jeconiah<WH3204> the son<WH1121> of Jehoiakim,<WH3079> king<WH4428> of Judah,<WH3063> and the princes<WH8269> of Judah,<WH3063> with the craftsmen<WH2796> and smiths,<WH4525> from Jerusalem,<WH3389> and had brought<WH935> them to Babylon.<WH894>

One<WH259> basket<WH1731> had very<WH3966> good<WH2896> figs,<WH8384> like the figs<WH8384> that are first-ripe;<WH1073> and the other<WH259> basket<WH1731> had very<WH3966> bad<WH7451> figs,<WH8384> which could not be eaten,<WH398> they were so bad.<WH7455>

Then Yahweh<WH3068> said<WH559> to me,<WH7200> What do you see, Jeremiah?<WH3414> I said,<WH559> Figs;<WH8384> the good<WH2896> figs,<WH8384> very<WH3966> good;<WH2896> and the bad,<WH7451> very<WH3966> bad,<WH7451> that can't<WH398> be eaten, they are so bad.<WH7455>
The word<WH1697> of Yahweh<WH3068> came to me,<WH559> saying,

Thus says<WH559> Yahweh,<WH3068> the God<WH430> of Israel:<WH3478> Like these good<WH2896> figs,<WH8384> so will I regard<WH5234> the captives<WH1546> of Judah,<WH3063> whom I have sent<WH7971> out of this place<WH4725> into the land<WH776> of the Chaldeans,<WH3778> for good.<WH2896>

For I will set<WH7760> my eyes<WH5869> on them for good,<WH2896> and I will bring them again<WH7725> to this land:<WH776> and I will build<WH1129> them,<WH2040> and not pull them down; and I will plant<WH5193> them,<WH5428> and not pluck them up.

I will give<WH5414> them a heart<WH3820> to know<WH3045> me,<WH3068> that I am Yahweh: and they shall be my people,<WH5971> and I will be their God;<WH430> for they shall return<WH7725> to me with their whole heart.<WH3820>

As the bad<WH7451> figs,<WH8384> which can't<WH398> be eaten, they are so bad,<WH7455> surely thus says<WH559> Yahweh,<WH3068> So will I give<WH5414> up Zedekiah<WH6667> the king<WH4428> of Judah,<WH3063> and his princes,<WH8269> and the residue<WH7611> of Jerusalem,<WH3389> who remain<WH7604> in this land,<WH776> and those who dwell<WH3427> in the land<WH776> of Egypt,<WH4714>

I will even give<WH5414> them up to be tossed<WH2189> back and forth among all the kingdoms<WH4467> of the earth<WH776> for evil;<WH7451> to be a reproach<WH2781> and a proverb,<WH4912> a taunt<WH8148> and a curse,<WH7045> in all places<WH4725> where I shall drive them.<WH5080>

I will send<WH7971> the sword,<WH2719> the famine,<WH7458> and the pestilence,<WH1698> among them,<WH8552> until they be consumed from off the land<WH127> that I gave<WH5414> to them and to their fathers.<WH1>
